nodes.text: The Cantina Hangover was a Shift-Vertical Fence obstacle used on a swoopchasing course. A simple Fence built in the shape of a large oblong tube, swoopchasers raced through a dimly lit recreation of a cantina with tables, stools, and bar fixtures fixed to the walls. The tube rotated, and the effect threw off the rider's spatial awareness or made them suffer from vertigo.
